Commentary.ab: Y11.14b aṣ̌a.ciϑra] cod.; Geldner, Redard aṣ̌aciϑra.

RecitationInstruction.ab: vasascā tū...] vasasca tī ahura mazda uštāca xšaēša OD druuatō staōiš (Y11.17) 6; vasasca tū ahura mazda OD vīspaiiā̊ druuatō stōiš (Y11.17) 40; vasasca tī ahura mazda OD OL Y druuatō stōiš (Y11.17) 88; vasasca tū ahura mazda OD yā ahūiriš zaraϑuštriš (Y11.16) 234; vasascatū ahurmazda OD rauuasca (Y11.17) 235; vascatū ahuramazda OD LOYŠE vīspaiiā̊ druuatōstōiš (Y11.17) 672.

Parallels.ab: vasō. āpō. vasō. uruuarā̊. ~ Y8.4 yā̊ apasca uruuarā̊; ~ Y9.4 āpa uruuaire; ~ Y18.2, Y51.8, Y65.15 yə̄ gąm tašō apascā uruuarā̊sca; ~ Y12.12 yā varanā āpō yā varanā uruuarā̊ ; Y16.9 ~ yazamaide vīspā̊ āpō yazamaide vīspā uruuarā̊; ~ Y37.1 dāt̰ apascā dāt̰ uruuarā̊sca vaŋᵛhīš; ~ Y44.4 kə̄ apō uruuarā̊scā; ~ VrS65.78, VrS65.80 auui apąmca vaŋᵛhinąm uruuuarnąmca; ~ VrS65.78, VrS65.80 yā̊ vaŋᵛhīš yā̊ āpō yā̊sca uruuarā̊.
vīspa vohū aṣ̌a.cīϑra ~ Y19.2, Y19.4, VS11.1, VS11.2, VS11.10, VS11.13, VS13.16 vīspa vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciϑra ~ Y22.4, Y22.24, Y22.25, Y24.3, Y24.8, Y25.3 vīspaca vohu mazdaδāta aṣ̌a.ciϑra.
